trait.name: Aberrant Form
entries: The zealot exudes the chaos of the Far Realm. Any non-Aberration creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the zealot must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Weirdly Pliable
entries: The zealot, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, is unnaturally flexible. The zealot can move through any space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The zealot makes one Psychic Rend attack and two Shortsword attacks.

action.name: Psychic Rend
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or have the {@condition stunned} condition until the start of the zealot's next turn.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The zealot magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) psychic damage and have the {@condition stunned} condition for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the {@condition stunned} condition on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The zealot casts one of the following spells, requiring no components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):
